name: kan
description: kan is a minimalist self hosted kanban board for personal or team task management. It provides columns, cards, drag and drop reordering and simple metadata, focusing on speed and a distraction free workflow.
features: Minimalist Design: Clean, distraction-free interface focused on task management. Get things done without complexity.
Kanban Workflow: Columns and cards with drag-and-drop reordering. Visualize work progress intuitively.
Fast Performance: Lightweight codebase with instant load times and responsive interactions. Work without delays.
Markdown Support: Write task descriptions and notes in markdown format. Rich text without heavy editors.
Keyboard Shortcuts: Navigate and manage tasks efficiently with keyboard commands. Speed up your workflow.
Local Storage: Tasks stored locally with optional sync capabilities. Own your data completely.
Quick Setup: No complex configuration required, start using immediately. Perfect for personal projects.
Task Metadata: Add due dates, priorities, and tags to organize tasks. Track important details simply.
Archive Completed: Move finished tasks to archive while keeping history. Maintain clean active boards.
Export & Import: Backup tasks or migrate between instances with JSON export. Portable task data.
